hard.code:
t=int(input())
for x in range(1,t+1):
    str=input()
    j=0
    k=0
    n=0
    p=0
    q=0
    for w in range(0,len(str)):
        if(w*w==len(str)):
            n=w
    s=n        
    if(n>0):            
        for z in range(q,s+1):
            if(str[j]==str[k]):
                p=p+1
                j=j+1
                k=k+n
        q=q+n+1
        s=s+n
        j=q
        k=q
    if(p==n):
        print("true")
    if(p!=n or n==0):
        print("false")
